name: Freezing Blast
description:
sweeps forward damaging enemies within for 96 + 96% Weapon Damage. Any of your Ice within the effect is converted to Frigid Ice.

Frigid Ice harms enemies within 5m over time Dazing them and inflicting 95 + 95% Weapon Damage. Enemies destroy it on contact taking 180 + 180% Weapon Damage, becoming Rooted and suffering Ice Buildup. Tripping it again while afflicted with Ice Buildup causes Knockdown.

Your Ice Storage Capacity determines the number of Ice you may have active simultaneously.
